name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty HD Edition
name_original: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty HD Edition
description:
Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty HD Edition is an action game developed by Armature Studio and KCEJ. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Konami. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty HD Edition on PlayStation 3.
